mapper.select: select p.product_id, p.seller_id, u.nickname, u.job, p.title, pi.b_price, p.filename1, avg(r.star_point) as avg_star_point, count(r.review_id) as review_count, p.createdAt, u.profile_image from product p left join user u on u.user_id = p.seller_id left join review r on p.product_id = r.product_id left join price_info pi on p.product_id = pi.product_price_id group by p.product_id,pi.b_price order by avg_star_point desc limit 5
select * from product where title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or category like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
